likelihood_impact_change.explanation: Under the 'Delayed Transition' scenario, consumer preferences may shift more rapidly towards sustainable and energy-efficient products. This could increase demand for greener alternatives, which may not align with current Mac Hardware offerings, leading to a slight increase in likelihood and a moderate increase in impact.

emerging_opportunities.description: Development of a new line of eco-friendly Mac products that leverage renewable materials and energy-efficient technology.
Implementing robust recycling programs for old Mac devices that can appeal to environmentally conscious consumers.

additional_challenges.description: Adjusting the supply chain to source sustainable materials could pose logistical challenges and increase costs.
Increased competition from brands focusing on sustainability could erode market share if Apple does not adapt quickly.

mitigation_strategies.strategy: Invest in R&D for Sustainable Tech
mitigation_strategies.description: Allocate resources to research and develop sustainable technologies for the Mac hardware line.
Launch a marketing campaign highlighting the sustainability features of Mac products.
Form partnerships with suppliers who prioritize sustainability to ensure a greener supply chain.
